title: ICT Police vow iron-hand action against lawbreakers
content:
ISLAMABAD, Oct 13 (APP): Islamabad Capital Territory (ICT) Police reiterated that the force is fully alert to protect the lives and property of citizens and will not allow any miscreant to take the law into their own hands.
An official told APP on Monday that Islamabad Police have made it clear no individual will be permitted to disturb peace or cause distress to the public. “Anyone attempting to break the law will be dealt with firmly and with an iron hand,” the spokesperson said.
He added that the capital police believe in public service and are actively engaged in ensuring facilities and ease for citizens while maintaining law and order.
The official further appealed to citizens to cooperate with police and immediately share any important information through the emergency helpline “Pucar-15.”
